test.confirmNext: Are you sure you want to proceed? You won't be able to return to this question.
test.complete: Congrats! You have completed test, there are your results.
test.areas_to_repeat: There are some areas you should repeat
test.amount_of_errors: Areas are provided with amount of errors made in particular area.

confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete whole history?
question: Question
all_questions_seen: All questions have been seen already. Questions will repeat.
not_enough_new_questions: Not enough new questions available. Some previously seen questions included.

instructions.title: User Manual for Students
instructions.intro: Welcome to our learning application! This guide will help you navigate the app, take tests, and understand your results.
instructions.step1: (Optional): Sign in with your account or sign up if you don't have one.
instructions.step2: Select your preferred language from the dropdown in the navigation bar.
instructions.test_step1: Navigate to the 'Test' page from the navigation bar.
instructions.test_step2: Answer the displayed question. Questions may be single-choice, multiple-choice, or open-ended.
instructions.test_step3: Submit your answer by clicking the 'Next' button. Ensure an answer is selected to enable the button.
instructions.test_step4: After completing all questions, view your results and areas for improvement.
instructions.results_intro: After completing a test, you will receive detailed results to help you improve.
instructions.results_areas: Areas to Repeat: Lists topics where you made errors, sorted by frequency.
instructions.results_time: Time Spent: Displays the time you spent on each question compared to the average.
instructions.results_history: Test History: Access past tests in the 'History' page to review your performance.
instructions.api_key: API Key: Access your API key from the 'API Key' page to integrate with external tools.
